text: Surapong Tovichakchaikul (May 1, 1953 â€“ May 20, 2020) was a Thai politician. He was Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Foreign Affairs of Thailand from 2011 to 2014. He was born in Chiang Mai Province, Thailand. He was a member of the Pheu Thai Party. Surapong died on 20 May 2020 of liver cancer at a hospital in Bangkok, aged 67. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Thai politicians Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Thailand
title: Surapong Tovichakchaikul
